stories.text:
Hi HackerNews!

I'm currently exploring the option creating an authentication service which is separated from the main backend. So I wanted to ask what auth tools/libraries/services you guys are satisfied with these days? Could be third-party, or just a library on your favorite language!
stories.title: Ask HN: What does people use for Auth in production these days
